inclusion.criterion: carotid endarterectomy for established clinical criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must sign written informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of carotid artery surgery (endovascular or open)

notes: Patient has significant bilateral carotid stenosis and is a candidate for carotid endarterectomy. However, there is no previous history of carotid artery surgery or cervical radiation.
